CustomField.description: This setting controls the behavior of the envelope status sync scheduled batch job. If checked, it only looks for envelope status changes for the Apttus created envelopes
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This setting controls the behavior of the envelope status sync scheduled batch job. If checked, it only looks for envelope status changes for the Apttus created envelopes
CustomField.label: Sync Apttus Created Envelopes Only
